headline: Jim Cramer on D.R. Horton: “Wall Street Simply Got Too Negative on This Group”
summary: D.R. Horton, Inc. (NYSE:DHI) is one of the stocks that Jim Cramer looked at. During the episode, Cramer discussed the stock in light of the “roaring” comeback by homebuilders. He said: “After struggling for the better part of a year, the home builders came roaring back today, led by D.R. Horton, the largest home builder […]
